data.Name: Sandy Putnam-Franklin
data.staff_bio: Prior to joining ICI, Sandy Putnam-Franklin spent 18 years as an Education Specialist and Interagency Coordinator at the Massachusetts Department of Education, Early Learning Services, and the new Department of Early Education and Care. She also was an instructor and supervisor of student teachers in elementary and early childhood education at Curry College for 10 years. For 15 years she served as Director/teacher of a private preschool program.
data.staff_ed:
B.S, Elementary Education, SUNY Cortland
M.Ed, Curry College, Milton, MA
data.staff_pubs:
Published by the Massachusetts Department of Education:
Massachusetts Early Childhood Program Standards
Massachusetts Guidelines for Preschool Learning Experiences
Integrating Young Children in Need of Substantial Special Education Supports
